metas.name: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- Season 3
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Psychological, Romance, Thriller Tags:Isekai/Cult/Elf/Witch/Magic/Male Protagonist/Super Power/Heterosexual/Ensemble Cast/Time Loop/Female Protagonist/Maids The third season of Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu.

A year has passed since Subaru’s victory at the Sanctuary. He savors a life of fulfillment while Emilia’s camp stands united for the royal selection—until a fateful letter arrives. Anastasia, a royal selection candidate, has invited Emilia to the Watergate City of Priestella. But as the party begins its journey, crisis stirs beneath the surface and Subaru meets a cruel fate once again.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Notes:
The first episode has an extended runtime of ~90 minutes, and received an early premiere at Anime Expo on July 5, 2024.

metas.name: BLUE LOCK Season 2
metas.description: Genres: Action, Drama, Sports Tags:Football/Male Protagonist/Battle Royale/Shounen/Super Power/Primarily Teen Cast/Primarily Male Cast/Ensemble Cast/Surreal Comedy The second season of Blue Lock.

metas.name: DAN DA DAN
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Comedy, Drama, Romance, Sci-Fi, Supernatural Tags:Youkai/Aliens/Female Protagonist/Urban Fantasy/Surreal Comedy/Male Protagonist/Heterosexual/Cult/Shounen This is a story about Momo, a high school girl who comes from a family of spirit mediums, and her classmate Okarun, an occult fanatic. After Momo rescues Okarun from being bullied, they begin talking. However, an argument ensues between them since Momo believes in ghosts but denies aliens exist, and Okarun believes in aliens but denies ghosts exist.

To prove to each other what they believe in is real, Momo goes to an abandoned hospital where a UFO has been spotted and Okarun goes to a tunnel rumored to be haunted. To their surprise, they each encounter overwhelming paranormal activities that transcend comprehension. Amid these predicaments, Momo awakens her hidden power and Okarun gains the power of a curse to overcome these new dangers! Their fateful love begins as well!?

The story of the occult battle and adolescence starts!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Notes:
- Worldwide premiere of Episode 1 before the Japanese television premiere occurred at Anime Expo July 6, 2024.
- Episodes 1-3 titled as DAN DA DAN: FIRST ENCOUNTER was pre-screened in advance in theaters on September 13, 2024. The regular TV broadcast begins October 2024.

metas.name: Seirei Gensouki 2
metas.description: Genres: Action, Drama, Fantasy, Romance Tags:Isekai/Magic/Male Protagonist/Female Harem The second season of Seirei Gensouki.

metas.name: BLEACH: Thousand-Year Blood War - The Conflict
metas.description: Genres: Action, Adventure, Supernatural Tags:War/Urban Fantasy/Swordplay/Male Protagonist/Super Power/Gods/Shounen The third part of BLEACH: Sennen Kessen-hen.

metas.name: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest Season 3
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Psychological Tags:Anti-Hero/Male Protagonist/Isekai/Magic/Heterosexual/Kemonomimi/Demons/Female Harem/Monster Girl/Vampire/Guns The third season of Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou.

Hajime Nagumo and his high school class are suddenly summoned to a fantastical land as heroes. But while most of his classmates have powerful stats and abilities, Hajime does not. Underappreciated and unprepared, he tumbles into the depths of a monster-infested dungeon where voracity and sacrifice are his only options. To thrive in this savage world, he’ll have no choice but to welcome the abyss.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

metas.name: Shangri-La Frontier 2nd Season
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Tags:Video Games/Virtual World/Swordplay/Male Protagonist/Anthropomorphism/Magic/Shounen/Hikikomori/Travel/Martial Arts
The second season of <i>Shangri-La Frontier<i>.

metas.name: Is It Wrong To Try To Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? V
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Romance Tags:Female Harem/Dungeon/Mythology/Gods/Male Protagonist/Primarily Female Cast/Ensemble Cast The fifth season of Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka.

Goddess Festival—A fruit festival that brings the labyrinth city of Orario to life. Goddesses symbolizing fertility are enshrined on the altar, and among them is the Goddess of Beauty. Bell Cranel, who has survived and returned to his daily life from the dead depths of the dungeon, is here and ready to enjoy the bustle of the Goddess Festival until he receives a letter from a girl at a small bar in a corner of Orario—"To Mr. Bell, please go on a date with just the two of us at the upcoming Goddess Festival. From Syr." Syr's single-minded determination will drive both Bell and the labyrinth city crazy. Meanwhile, the Einherjar, the warriors who claim to be the "strongest," are now suddenly on the move...

(Source: HIDIVE)

metas.name: Blue Box
metas.description:
Genres: Romance, Slice of Life, Sports Tags:Heterosexual/Coming of Age/School Club/School/Male Protagonist/Badminton/Athletics/Female Protagonist/Primarily Teen Cast/Basketball/Shounen Do these sports-crossed lovers have a chance?

Taiki Inomata loves badminton, but he has a long way to go before he can reach nationals. When Taiki sees upperclassman Chinatsu Kano practicing her heart out on the girls’ basketball team, he falls for her hard. After an unexpected turn of events brings the two closer together, sports might not be the first thing on their minds anymore!

(Source: TMS Anime)

metas.name: Sword Art Online Alternative: Gun Gale Online II
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Sci-Fi Tags:Guns/Video Games/Female Protagonist The second season of Sword Art Online Alternative: Gun Gale Online.

Note: On June 17, 2024, Studio 3Hz announced their acquisition by A-1 Pictures. The GGO Project would continue to be handled by the same staff, now working under their new studio's name.

metas.name: Blue Exorcist -Beyond the Snow Saga-
metas.description: Genres: Action, Fantasy, Supernatural Tags:Urban Fantasy/Shounen/Male Protagonist Sequel to Ao no Exorcist: Shimane Illuminati-hen.

metas.name: Kamonohashi Ron no Kindan Suiri 2nd Season
metas.description: Genres: Drama, Mystery Tags:Detective/Work/Male Protagonist The second season of Kamonohashi Ron no Kindan Suiri.

metas.name: Tensei Kizoku, Kantei Skill de Nariagaru 2nd Season
metas.description: Genres: Adventure, Fantasy Tags:Isekai/Coming of Age/Magic/Swordplay/Male Protagonist/Shounen The second season of Tensei Kizoku, Kantei Skill de Nariagaru.

metas.name: You are Ms. Servant
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Romance, Slice of Life Tags:Maids/Assassins/School/Kuudere/Shounen/Female Protagonist/Heterosexual This is the story of a maid who is all alone in the world, but who finally finds a family.

Told from young that her only worth is as a killer, Yuki had known nothing else except cold efficiency and following orders. Now that she has a chance to leave her past behind, she arrives at the doorstep of Hitoyoshi Yokoya, asking to be employed… as a maid?! Thus begins the journey of a former assassin learning what it means to be ‘normal’!

(Source: Shogakukan)

metas.name: After-school Hanako-kun Part 2
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural Tags:Ghost/School/Mythology/Episodic/Youkai/Ensemble Cast Continuation of Houkago Shounen Hanako-kun.

The spirit Hanako-kun and his human assistant, first-year student Nene Yashiro, keep the peace between supernatural forces and the students of Kamome Academy. When they’re not fighting to maintain balance between the living and spirit worlds, how do they spend their time? Join Hanako-kun and Nene on their adventures after school!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

metas.name: Natsume Yuujinchou Shichi
metas.description: Genres: Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural Tags:Youkai/Iyashikei/Male Protagonist/Rural/Shoujo The seventh season of Natsume Yuujinchou.

metas.name: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Drama, Ecchi, Romance Tags:Shrine Maiden/Heterosexual/Female Harem/Found Family/Shounen Uryuu Kamihate is a high school student striving to enter Kyoto University’s medical school. After being raised at an orphanage, Uryuu is taken in by the chief priest at Amagami Shrine, where he begins to live as a freeloader—and to cohabit with Yae, Yuna, and Asahi, the three beautiful shrine maiden sisters! What’s more, the condition he must meet in order to live at the shrine for free is to marry into the family and inherit the shrine! How will Uryuu overcome his marriage meetings with the three sisters as well as the many challenges that Amagami Shrine faces? So begins a miraculous rom-com about living under the same roof with three shrine maidens!

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)

metas.name: Rekishi ni Nokoru Akujo ni Naruzo
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Fantasy, Romance Tags:Villainess/Isekai I absolutely hate a world filled with sweet talking. I'll fight the Heroine's rationale head on!!!

After waking up as the villainess she admires so much from her favourite otome game, Alicia trains hard every day to become the greatest villainess of all time.

metas.name: Loner Life in Another World
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy Tags:Isekai/Male Protagonist/Hikikomori/Necromancy/Surreal Comedy When acerbic loner Haruka gets transported to another world with his class, he’s not big on adventuring, but he wouldn’t mind some cool magic of his own. Unfortunately, the magic powers are first-come-first-served, and by Haruka’s turn, there’s nothing good left to choose from. Now he’ll have to take on this fantasy world the hard way, with a hodgepodge selection of bizarre skills…and with all the girls in class tagging along!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

metas.name: Demon Lord 2099
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi Tags:Cyberpunk/Demons/Magic/Male Protagonist The cyberpunk metropolis Shinjuku—a massive city-state bedecked with neon signs, towering skyscrapers, and the latest cutting-edge technology. It is here, in year 2099 of the Fused Era, where the legendary Demon Lord Veltol has his second coming five centuries in the making. But this landscape is nothing like the one he conquered all those years ago, for the fusion of magic and engineering has elevated civilization to dazzling, unprecedented heights. Veltol may have been reduced to a historical footnote, but make no mistake…this brave new world will be his for the taking!

(Source: Yen Press)

metas.name: Love Live! Superstar!! 3rd Season
metas.description: Genres: Music, Slice of Life Tags:Idol/Primarily Female Cast/Dancing/Female Protagonist/Cute Girls Doing Cute Things The third season of Love Live! Superstar!!

metas.name: Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Romantan - Kyoto Douran
metas.description: Genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Romance Tags:Samurai/Swordplay/Male Protagonist/Historical/Shounen The second season of Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Romantan (2023).

metas.name: Kekkon Suru tte, Hontou desu ka: 365 Days To The Wedding
metas.description:
Genres: Romance Tags:Marriage/Office Lady/Heterosexual/Kuudere/Work/Seinen/Male Protagonist/Primarily Adult Cast/Female Protagonist/Rural Takuya and Rika are coworkers in a travel agency in Tokyo. They’re both single, but they don’t mind, since they’re introverts with fulfilling lives at home. Unfortunately, now their job is looking to staff an office in Siberia, and non-married employees are the first to be considered. Rika is desperate to avoid the transfer and goes to Takuya with an idea: if they pretend they’re getting married in a year, they can stay in Tokyo. The only problem is the two of them barely know each other! If these two quiet coworkers “fake” a relationship, will it turn into something real?

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

metas.name: Demon Lord, Retry! R
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy Tags:Isekai/Magic The Demon Lord continues his adventure in this re-vamped series! After encountering the mysterious entity in the lowest level of the Bastille Dungeon, he sets out for Hellion Territory, where Grand Devils vie for domination of the realm. With the addition of a new advisor—the (seemingly) hopeless optimist Akane—the Demon Lord’s army grows even more colorful, and their hijinks even wackier.

(Source: J-Novel Club)

metas.name: Nina the Starry Bride
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Fantasy, Romance Tags:Josei/Female Protagonist/Politics/Love Triangle/Royal Affairs/Arranged Marriage/Heterosexual Nina, a girl living as an orphan in the Fortna Castle Town, happens to have eyes of the same deep blue hue as lapis lazuli—just like the God of the Stars. They’re also the same color as the eyes of the recently deceased Princess Alisha. For that reason, when the second prince of Fortna, Azure, discovers Nina, he ordains that she will live as the princess in Alisha’s place. As substitute princess and Priestess of the Stars, Nina is obligated to become the false bride of Sett, the first prince of the large neighboring nation of Galgada after the third month has passed. Despite being at the mercy of fate, Nina is just happy to feel needed by someone. What is it that her open, honest eyes see? The destinies of all the players on this stage begin to move when they make up their minds to protect the ones they love!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

metas.name: Tsuma, Shougakusei ni Naru.
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Drama, Romance, Slice of Life
Tags:Seinen/Heterosexual/Iyashikei
The trials and tribulations of a single father, who one day meets the reincarnation of his deceased wife.

metas.name: Yakuza Fiancé
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Drama, Romance Tags:Female Protagonist/Yakuza/Yandere/Male Protagonist/Crime/Seinen/Arranged Marriage/Urban/Gore Somei Renji is Somei Yoshino’s grandfather and leader of the “Somei Group”, the Kansai region’s biggest yakuza group. When he arranges for her to be married to Miyama Kirishima, Yoshino has to move to “Miyama Clan” estate, the Kanto region’s biggest yakuza group. Kirishima warmly welcomes Yoshino and is such a pleasant, personable, and nice young man that nobody would suspect that he comes from a yakuza family. This puts Yoshino at ease even though she was initially feeling insecure in this unfamiliar place.

But then, a certain event leads to Yoshino witnessing the real Kirishima.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

metas.name: Kabushiki Gaisha Magi Lumiere
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Mahou Shoujo Tags:Magic/Work/Female Protagonist/Primarily Adult Cast/Urban Fantasy/Shounen/Software Development “Magical Girl”— A profession that undertakes the work of exterminating a kind of natural disaster called “Kaii.” Kana Sakuragi, a female college student who struggles with job hunting, is picked up by a magical girl startup company and…?! Magical Girl work-life starts now!

(Source: MANGA Plus)

metas.name: Nanatsu no Taizai: Mokushiroku no Yonkishi 2nd Season
metas.description: Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy Tags:Shounen The second season of Nanatsu no Taizai: Mokushiroku no Yonkishi.

metas.name: Party kara Tsuihou sareta Sono Chiyushi, Jitsu wa Saikyou ni Tsuki
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy Tags: The story follows Raust, a healer who can only use one basic spell and is expelled from a first-class party for being too weak. While the leader of that party realizes how great his abilities actually are after hiring another healer, Raust finds new friends like Narsena who support him and his rise to the top.

(Source: Crunchyroll News)

metas.name: Sayonara Ryuusei Konnichiwa Jinsei
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy Tags:Dragons/Rural/Male Protagonist/Monster Girl After living a long life as the strongest and oldest dragon, he is slain by a human hero. He awakes to find himself reborn as a human, Dolan, in a remote village. He works hard as a farmer and sometimes hunts for food. His life is simple in this small village, but he is surrounded by love. He soon finds happiness he'd never experienced in his life as a dragon. However, dangerous monsters are lurking around his village lately and he goes to the woods to investigate when he finds out an army of monsters are heading his way...

(Source: Alpha Manga)

metas.name: Mahoutsukai ni Narenakatta Onnanoko no Hanashi.
metas.description:
Genres: Fantasy Tags:School/Magic Kurumi Mirai is in the first year of high school.

She has enrolled in junior high section of the Redrun Magic School, the world's only facility for mages that approved by International Mage League and able to work under royal families when graduates, and she was always top of the class. However, when she applies for the high school section and took the examination to get into a mage training class "Ma-gumi (Mage Class)", she wasn't able to get in in spite having full scores and was top of the class for the whole three years.

There are some students in the class next to her that takes that class. Among that there's someone she admires. How will Kurumi Mirai who has extraordinary brain but didn't get in to be a mage candidate try to overcome and grow up? What is the aim for Minami Suzuki, a loyal mage who suddenly appears to be the homeroom teacher? This is a relaxing story of her growth.

(Source: MAL News)

metas.name: Ao no Miburo
metas.description:
Genres: Drama Tags:Male Protagonist/Historical/Samurai/Shounen It's 1863, the twilight of the shogunate, and Japan is on the cusp of monumental change. The streets of the nation's capital are soaked in blood as political upheaval and rising tensions between masterless, wandering ronin and government samurai set the stage for one of the most turbulent times in Japan's history. Young orphan Nio is no stranger to the harsh realities of the world, and yet he can't help but cling to his burning passion for justice and desire to change the world for the better.

One day, he crosses paths with two men who will become central figures of the coming revolution: Hijikata Toshizo and Okita Souji, two of the founding members of a group of hated ronin known as the Miburo—who would later become known as the Shinsengumi. Inspired by the efforts of the so-called "Blues Wolves of Mibu," Nio decides to join the ranks to help carve a path to the world he wishes to see. But with new betrayals and reversals every day, will Nio be able to stay true to his conscience?

(Source: Kodansha USA, edited)

metas.name: Goukon ni Ittara Onna ga Inakatta Hanashi
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Romance Tags:Crossdressing/Tomboy/Primarily Adult Cast/Shoujo/College/Heterosexual College student Tokiwa gets invited to a mixer by his female classmate Suo. But when he arrives with his friends, they're greeted by three dazzlingly handsome men?! But as the two groups get to know each other, they find themselves getting closer in unexpected ways.

(Source: MANGA UP!)

metas.name: Saikyou no Shien-shoku [Wajutsushi] Dearu Ore wa Sekai Saikyou Clan wo Shitagaeru
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Psychological Tags:Male Protagonist/Magic/Seinen/Swordplay Noel has grown up idolizing his grandfather, a legendary adventurer of the class known as Seekers. But when it comes time for Noel to set out on his own, much to his dismay, he turns out to be a Talker: a support class with meager abilities. But Noel’s got ambition in spades–and the smarts to match–so he’s determined to do whatever it takes to make the world know his name!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

metas.name: Acro Trip
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Fantasy, Mahou Shoujo Tags:Shoujo/Magic/Female Protagonist/Henshin/Otaku Culture Chizuko, who lives in Sakai City, Niigata Prefecture, is an otaku girl who is a big fan of the magical girl Berry Blossom who protects the city against the evil organisation Fossa Magna. However, nobody was worried about the battle of the two anymore because Chroma, the wicked evil villain, was too lazy and weak.

So Chizuko decided “I want to make my magical girl shine more…!” That desire (?) leads the shy junior high school student down a strange, evil path…

metas.name: Yarinaoshi Reijou wa Ryuutei Heika wo Kouryaku-chuu
metas.description:
Genres: Fantasy, Romance Tags:Dragons/Heterosexual Jill is sentenced to death by the crown prince, her fiancé. But just before she dies, she’s sent back in time six years to the party where their engagement had been decided. To avoid this route of ruin, Jill immediately proposes to the person standing behind her…but it’s the man who was her greatest enemy, Emperor Hadis?! Jill knows all about his future descent into evil. She quickly retracts the proposal, but the delighted Hadis takes her back to his castle and makes her a meal. Completely won over by the food, Jill makes a life-changing decision…

(Source: Cross Infinite World)

metas.name: Nageki no Bourei ha Intai Shitai
metas.description:
Genres: Tags: It's the golden age for treasure hunters—adventurers hungry for wealth, fame, power, and glory, who risk their lives in treasure vaults throughout the world.

“Let's become treasure hunters.”

Krai and his childhood friends swore to become the greatest of them all, but that dream should have died the day Krai realized he wasn't cut out for the job! Yet expectations continue to mount, right along with Krai's fear for his life. While his childhood friends climb closer toward their dream, this grieving soul has one simple wish: to pack it all in and retire!

(Source: J-Novel Club)

metas.name: GUNDAM: Requiem for Vengeance
metas.description:
Genres: Mecha, Sci-Fi Tags:Full CGI/Real Robot/CGI In the year 0079 of the Universal Century, the Principality of Zeon declares independence from the Earth Federation, plunging the two nations into war. Thanks to a revolutionary new weapon known as a Mobile Suit, the Zeon Force initially gains the upper hand. However, they lacked the power to take control of the entire Earth, bringing the war to a stalemate.

Eleven months into the war, the Earth Federation forces manage to seize a Zeon-controlled base located in Eastern Europe. Among the mixed battalion headed to reclaim this base is Sorari and the Red Wolves division, a Mobile Suit platoon that has just descended from space.

(Source: Netflix)

metas.name: Touhai: Ura Rate Mahjong Touhai Roku
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Psychological, Sports Tags:Mahjong/Seinen/Yakuza Money, women, organs. Kei, a high school boy, frequents the underground mahjong parlor teeming with desires, earning him the moniker 'K of Ice' in the underworld due to his cold-hearted strategy and stylish gameplay. Rumors also circulate that he keeps a girl at his home.

(Source: Pony Canyon)

metas.name: Trillion Game
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Comedy, Drama, Psychological Tags:Economics/Seinen/Male Protagonist/Urban Meet Haru Tennouji, a charismatic communicator beloved by all, regardless of age or gender. He may come across as easygoing, but beneath that façade lies an unwavering ambition for success. When offered a prestigious position at the nation's largest IT company, "Dragon Bank," he does the unexpected—turning it down in favor of embarking on an entrepreneurial journey alongside his friend, Manabu Taira. Their audacious objective: to amass a staggering 1 trillion dollars.
Now, let's introduce Manabu, a brilliant engineer armed with remarkable IT acumen. Personality-wise, he's the antithesis of Haru—introverted, and a tad awkward in social interactions. Having faced rejection from "Dragon Bank" due to his communication challenges, he joins forces with Haru, sharing in the colossal ambition of earning that elusive 1 trillion dollars.

(Source: MAL News)

metas.name: Haigakura
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy
Tags:Josei/Gods
Nozomu wants to be a writer, but for now she's just trying to find the right story. Walking home from school one day she bumps into some guys, and even though it's an accident, they hassle her until she is saved by a mysterious man. His name is Ichiyou, and he is searching for Gods. Nozomu sends him along his way only to be approached by Tenkou, who is searching for his Master. Nozomu reunites Ichiyou and Tenkou; (and their abusive relationship), and gets a view of another world. The two men are on a journey to find the Gods. The world that was once supported by four evil Gods, has fallen to a crisis. Using song and dance, it is up to the kashikans to bring back the Gods which fled from their confinement…

metas.name: Youkai Gakkou no Sensei Hajimemashita!
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Supernatural Tags:Youkai/School/Male Protagonist/Teacher/Urban Fantasy/Shounen Rookie teacher Haruaki Abe is as cowardly as they come. It's hard enough for him to handle human students without whimpering-and now he's going to be teaching at a school full of monsters?! It's a classroom of horrors for Haruaki, as his mischievous students use every means at their disposal to prank him! Will this poor teacher be able to get his group of ghouls under control, or is this class destined for failure?

(Source: Yen Press)

metas.name: Murai no Koi
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Tags:Shoujo/Teacher/Otaku Culture/Heterosexual
The slightly strange high school student Murai confessed love to his teacher and otome-game fanatic Tanaka-sensei. She refused by telling him she's not interested in (real-life) long, black-haired boys. The next day, Murai came back with short blonde hair, which made him look just like Tanaka-sensei's favorite game character! A non-stop romantic comedy between a stubborn high school boy and his favorite teacher!

metas.name: Kamierabi GOD.app Season 2
metas.description: Genres: Action, Drama, Psychological, Supernatural Tags:Full CGI The second season of Kamierabi.

metas.name: Shin Tennis no Ouji-sama: U-17 WORLD CUP SEMIFINAL
metas.description: Genres: Action, Comedy, Sports Tags:Tennis The sequel to Shin Tennis no Ouji-sama: U-17 WORLD CUP.

metas.name: The iDOLM@STER: Shiny Colors 2nd season
metas.description:
Genres: Music Tags:Primarily Female Cast/Idol The second season of The iDOLM@STER: Shiny Colors.

Note: The series is having a three-part theatrical pre-screening in Japan starting in July 2024. Regular TV broadcast begins in Fall 2024.
• Part 1 releasing theatrically on July 5, 2024.
• Part 2 releasing theatrically on August 23, 2024.
• Part 3 releasing theatrically on September 20, 2024.

metas.name: Ooi! Tonbo 2nd Season
metas.description: Genres: Drama, Sports Tags:Golf/Female Protagonist The second season of Ooi! Tonbo.

metas.name: Hyakushou Kizoku 2nd Season
metas.description: Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life Tags:Agriculture/Animals/Shoujo/Autobiographical/Female Protagonist/Rural/Work The second season of Hyakushou Kizoku.

metas.name: Duel Masters LOST:  Tsuioku no Suishou
metas.description:
Genres: Adventure
Tags:Card Battle
null
